formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: \operatorname{rank}(A) = \text{dimension of the span of the rows of } A = \text{dimension of the span of the columns of } A.
formulas.raw: \operatorname{rank}(A) = \text{dimension of the span of the rows of } A = \text{dimension of the span of the columns of } A.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \[ \operatorname{rank}(A) = \text{dimension of the span of the rows of } A = \text{dimension of the span of the columns of } A. \]

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \[ A \sim R \quad\Rightarrow\quad \operatorname{rank}(A) = \operatorname{rank}(R), \] where \(\sim\) denotes row equivalence and \(R\) is the RREF of \(A\). The number of non zero rows of \(R\) equals \(\operatorname{rank}(A)\).
